casebody.data:
RYAN MARINE PRODUCTS PTY., LTD., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. HALE PROPELLER, L.L.C., Randal L. Hale, Jr., and Randal L. Hale, III, Defendants-Cross Appellants. Nos. 01-1613, 02-1007. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. June 5, 2002.

*527Before CLEVENGER, Circuit Judge, FRIEDMAN, Senior Circuit Judge, and SCHALL, Circuit Judge.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
